title: Happy 4th! Amy Regrets a Gift for Her Son + Our Truths That Sound Like A Lie + Easy TV Theme Songs Game
itunes:title: Happy 4th! Amy Regrets a Gift for Her Son + Our Truths That Sound Like A Lie + Easy TV Theme Songs Game
description:
Amy talks about a gift her son got that is now driving her a bit crazy. We each tell stories that sound like a lie but are actually true. We play a round of the Easy TV Theme songs game. Have a safe, fun 4th of July!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
